text: vy ne zdiysnyuyete shcho BOH vede khmary, todi zbyraye yikh razom, todi nahromadzhuye yikh na odyn odnoho, todi vy bachyte , shcho doshch vytikayete z nykh? Vin posylaye vnyz z vantazhiv neba snihu nakryty whomever Vin wills, toy chas, yak vidvodyachy yomu z whomever Vin wills. brightness snizhnykh mayzhe zavisok ochi
